page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: THIS IS A VERY RURAL AREA. THERE ARE TWO VILLAGES, TWO HAMLETS, ONE MODERN HOUSING ESTATE ON THE EDGE OF A SMALL TOWN AND A LOT OF SPACED OUT COTTAGES AND FARMS. MOST OF THE LAND IS AGRICULTURAL, INTENSIVELY MANAGED GRASSLAND USED FOR COWS AND SHEEP. IN THE SUMMER THERE IS A LOT OF HAY AND SILAGE MAKING.THERE IS VERY LITTLE INDUSTRY HERE AND NOT MANY JOBS,PEOPLE HAVE TO TRAVEL TO THE TOWNS AROUND (WREXHAM,OSWESTRY,CHESTER,SHREWSBURY) TO WORK. THE A5 ROAD RUNS NORTH TO SOUTH ACROSS OUR AREA AND IS VERY BUSY.THERE IS ALSO A RAILWAY AND THE SHROPSHIRE UNION CANAL.IT IS A VERY PEACEFUL PART OF THE COUNTRY, BUT YOUNG PEOPLE COMPLAIN THAT THERE IS NOT ENOUGH TO DO.
